name: Perfect Body
description:
It's done.
You are at your peak.
You're now as Perfect as you can be for what you're able to do...

badges.text:
While in End Form:
- You have 8 hearts
- Are 10% slimmer
- 25% less hunger usage

While in Nether Form:
- You have 8 hearts
- Are 1.5 Blocks tall
- 15% more movement speed
- 10% less hunger usage
